venue.name: The Essex Vermont’s Culinary Resort & Spa

item.description:
Check out Traveling Singles Meetup group to see who is attending: http://www.meetup.com...

WE STILL HAVE ROOMS AVAILABLE AT THE $237 RATE! Also, we have a room share available - pay only $135 total for both two nights. Email me if you are interested: jackierg@comcast.net


Attend our very first trip!Enjoy a fabulous weekend doing whatever you want. Relax at the spa, participate in activities, shop, or visit some great attractions. This 4 star resort has an indoor pool, outdoor hot tub, fitness center, and gorgeous new spa (voted best in Vermont).

Arrive any time on Friday depart any time on Sunday.

b]Cost is $15 to hold your spot - payable through this site.
Once your $15 deposit is received, you will receive an email on how to pay the balance directly to the Essex with your credit card. Scroll to bottom to see rates.

Carpool - arrangements will be made as soon as reservations are made and we see who is going.

We get 20% off of culinary classes, spa services, and more...

Essex Resort & Spa Website

Stuff to do at the Essex and in the Burlington area:

Friday night we’ll have dinner at the resort and hang out in their tavern for a casual dinner and an evening of fun socializing. If you plan on getting there early, consider a spa treatment, browse the outlett shoppes across the street, take a walk, or just relax in the comfy lobby area while sipping on hot cider.

Saturday and/or Sunday – walk along Lake Champlain, browse the shops downtown, spend time at the spa, take a swim, visit the outlet stores, relax, read a book, visit Ben & Jerry’s or the Vermont Teddy Bear Factory. These are just a few of the things you can do. See below for more.

Saturday night – relax and socialize at the hotel Tavern after enjoying the bonfire with s’mores (weather permitting).

Spa at the Essex
Voted best in Vermont. Offers several spa services from manicures to massages to several different body treatments and relaxation rooms. One service (or $25) gets you full use of the spa including relaxation rooms, saunas, etc. Spa treatments need to be booked at least 3 days in advance. Visit the website for a menu of services and call the resort to schedule your services.

Bonfire
Every Saturday night the resort has a bonfire with s’mores (weather permitting).

Cooking Classes
Check the schedule to sign up for a cooking class.

Bicycle Rentals
For leisure, recreational riding.

Northern Lights Rock and Ice
High Ropes, Low Elements, Zip Wires, Rock & Ice Climbing, etc.
http://www.northernli...

Lake Champlain
Take a walk or bike ride along the largest and most beautiful lake. I will be organizing a group walk on Saturday or Sunday along this magnificent Lake.

Shopping
Visit down town Burlington and walk the cobblestones while browsing the shops.
Essex outlet shoppes including Polo, Reebok, Bogner, OshKosh, Carters)

Attractions
Visit Vermont Teddy Bear Factory, Lake Champlain Chocolates, Magic Hat Brewery, Ben & Jerry’s, etc.

Room Rates
$237.00 per person, single occupancy for two nights. (You may share a room with a cot and pay only $119.00.)

Room Availability Options - price per room is $237 plus...
Traditional Room (1 bed) with gas fireplaces @ $20 plus tax per night
Traditional Room (2 beds) with gas fireplaces @ $20 plus tax per night
Minisuite (1 bed) @ $30 plus tax per night
Minisuites (2 beds) @ $30 plus tax per night
Luxury Room (1 bed) @ $30 plus tax per night
Studios (1 bed) @ $30 plus tax per night
Deluxe One Bedrooms (king and full-size pullout) @ $50 plus tax per night
Luxury One Bedrooms (queen and full-size pullout) @ $60 plus tax per night
item.name: Vermont Weekend Getaway at the Essex Resort & Spa
